p: The systematic review protocol has been registered on the prospero website as CRD42020200894 ( https://www.crd.york.ac.uk/prospero/#recordDetails). It is reported following the guidelines of Cochrane Handbook for Systematic Reviews of Interventions and the Preferred Reporting Items for Systematic Reviews and Meta-analysis Protocol (PRISM). [ 15] We will update our protocol for any changes in the entire research process if needed.
